name: Stray Souls: Stolen Memories HD - A Hidden Object Game with Hidden Objects
name_original: Stray Souls: Stolen Memories HD - A Hidden Object Game with Hidden Objects
description:
Try this immersive, high-quality game for FREE! Then continue the adventure with a ONE TIME unlock and play offline!
NO VIRTUAL ITEMS, NO INTERRUPTIONS… you’ll OWN this game for life.

Take a journey into this incredible Collector's Edition as you travel through a twisted world to find and save your daughter who was taken by an apparition.

• JUMP INTO A TWISTED REALITY!
Guide a mother who pursues a terrifying apparition to save her daughter.

• 48 UNIQUE LOCATIONS
Explore a strange town in which an evil clown has turned all of the residents into wooden dolls!

• PEEL BACK THE LAYERS OF A DISTURBING STORY
Slowly reveal why the mother's husband has never spoken about his past while playing through imaginative puzzles and incredible Hidden Object scenes

• UNLOCK THIS AMAZING COLLECTOR'S EDITION!
Gain access to a shocking bonus chapter and High Definition wallpapers and concept art. Use the integrated strategy guide to help you through any tricky parts of this great story
